acaStatus.description: The Affordable Care Act status of the employee.

acaStatusCategory.description: The category of the Affordable Care Act status of the employee.

address1.description: First line of the employee's address.

address2.description: Second line of the employee's address.

bestEmail.description: The primary email address of the employee.

bonusAmount.description: The amount of bonus received by the employee.

bonusComment.description: Comment related to the bonus received by the employee.

bonusDate.description: Date on which the bonus was received by the employee.

bonusReason.description: Reason for granting the bonus to the employee.

city.description: City where the employee is located.

commissionAmount.description: The amount of commission received by the employee.

commissionComment.description: Comment related to the commission received by the employee.

commissionDate.description: Date on which the commission was received by the employee.

commisionDate.description: Date of commission for the employee.

country.description: Country where the employee is located.

createdByUserId.description: ID of the user who created the employee record.

dateOfBirth.description: Date of birth of the employee.

department.description: Department in which the employee works.

division.description: Division to which the employee belongs.

eeo.description: Equal Employment Opportunity (EEO) information of the employee.

employmentHistoryStatus.description: Status of the employee's employment history.

exempt.description: Exempt status of the employee for employment regulations.

flsaCode.description: Fair Labor Standards Act (FLSA) code classification of the employee.

fullName1.description: First version of the employee's full name.

fullName2.description: Second version of the employee's full name.

fullName3.description: Third version of the employee's full name.

fullName4.description: Fourth version of the employee's full name.

fullName5.description: Fifth version of the employee's full name.

hireDate.description: Date on which the employee was hired.

originalHireDate.description: Original hire date of the employee.

homeEmail.description: Home email address of the employee.

homePhone.description: Home phone number of the employee.

isPhotoUploaded.description: Indicator if the employee's photo is uploaded in the system.

jobTitle.description: Title of the employee's job position.

lastChanged.description: Date of the last change made to the employee's record.

location.description: Physical location where the employee works.

mobilePhone.description: Mobile phone number of the employee.

nationalId.description: National identification number of the employee.

nin.description: National Insurance Number (NIN) of the employee.

payChangeReason.description: Reason for a change in payment for the employee.

payGroup.description: Group to which the employee's payment belongs.

payGroupId.description: ID of the payment group for the employee.

payRate.description: Rate of pay for the employee.

payRateEffectiveDate.description: Date from which the pay rate is effective for the employee.

payType.description: Type of payment for the employee.

paidPer.description: Frequency at which the employee is paid.

paySchedule.description: Schedule according to which the employee is paid.

payScheduleId.description: ID of the payment schedule for the employee.

payFrequency.description: Frequency of payment for the employee.

includeInPayroll.description: Indicator if the employee is included in the payroll system.

timeTrackingEnabled.description: Indicator if time tracking is enabled for the employee.

ssn.description: Social Security Number (SSN) of the employee.

sin.description: Social Insurance Number (SIN) of the employee.

standardHoursPerWeek.description: Standard number of hours worked by the employee per week.

state.description: State where the employee is located.

stateCode.description: Code representing the state where the employee is located.

supervisorEId.description: Employee ID of the employee's supervisor.

supervisorEmail.description: Email address of the employee's supervisor.

terminationDate.description: Date on which the employee was terminated.

workEmail.description: Work email address of the employee.

workPhone.description: Work phone number of the employee.

workPhonePlusExtension.description: Full work phone number including extension for the employee.

workPhoneExtension.description: Extension number for the employee's work phone.

zipcode.description: Zip code of the employee's location.
